document_title: Meningitis: Signs, causes, complications and diagnosis
subsection_content: Meningitis is an infection of the protective membranes surrounding the brain and spinal cord (meninges). The disease can affect anyone, but is most common in infants and young children. (first)
subsection_title: viem mang nao.json. What is meningitis?
subsection_data:
viem mang nao.json. What is meningitis?
Meningitis is an infection of the protective membranes surrounding the brain and spinal cord (meninges). The disease can affect anyone, but is most common in infants and young children. (first)
